title: Foreign Language Training Course in Science Fields Based on Cognitive Congruence Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and job-related foreign language expressions
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen foreign language communication skills required for science sector managers/leaders in their professional roles.

learning_goals: Learners can use foreign language expressions required in scientific work situations with over 80% accuracy
Learners can reproduce over 70% of foreign language learning content through collaborative learning with peers
Learners can self-assess and improve their learning progress three or more times through formative evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
